EmailTemplate.subject: Say yes to NCS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Say YES to NCS
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Recently {!Contact.FirstName} expressed an interest in doing NCS. {!Contact.FirstName} can take part in this once-in-a-lifetime experience during February half term and, if this isn’t convenient, there are also several start dates over the summer to choose from. *
You may have seen some of our recent TV ads which feature parents talking about what their son or daughter has gained from NCS…
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5LobrFZDIyA
There’s lots of information on our website and {!Contact.FirstName} can sign up for NCS here. Log in details can be recovered by clicking the link on our booking website.
http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/ http://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
Make sure {!Contact.FirstName} doesn't miss out on the experience of a lifetime.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
*Young people need to meet our age eligibility criteria - for our February half term programme, participants must have turned 16 or 17 by 31 August 2014, for our summer programme, participants must be 16 on, or before 31 August 2015. They must not be 18 during the residential part of any programme. For more information please see the terms and conditions on our website.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
